0.dialouge:
There you are you young whippersnapper!~
I was wondering when you would decide to show up.
0.speaker: Sir Magnis

1.dialouge:
This won't do Klay!~
We are two days from the selection!
1.speaker: Sir Magnis

3.dialouge: Sorry won't cut it kid.~ You've always wanted to be a Vanguard didn't you?
3.speaker: Sir Magnis

4.dialouge:
Well a Vanguard must be brave and capable.~
And above all...~ a Vanguard must be disciplined.
4.speaker: Sir Magnis

5.dialouge: The coming selection is your chance to show that you have those traits and join the ranks of the Vanguard.
5.speaker: Sir Magnis

6.dialouge:
Your performance in the coming week would not only dictate your future but your partners as well.~
You wouldn't want to drag Malo down now would you?.
6.speaker: Sir Magnis

8.dialouge: Then be back on campus before five from now on.
8.speaker: Sir Magnis

9.dialouge:
Sigh...~ Your schedule for the selection will be out tomorrow night.~
Until then, you should get some rest.
9.speaker: Sir Magnis
